title: Ethnic and religious conflicts and African states

content.prompt: Which of the following was the most significant factor that prevented many African states from achieving political stability in the decades after their independence?

choices.label: Continued military intervention by former colonizing powers
Ethnic and religious conflicts caused by the inclusion of rival groups within the same borders
Frequent attempts by the larger states to conquer their smaller neighbors

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
